attributes.action: Reunite The Falkland Islands and Argentina
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that we should reunite The falklands with argentina because the land is Argentina's and should be theirs if we hadnt taken over. Therefore We should give back land that isnt ours by right.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
